ModMetaData.name: Christmas Hats (continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Make your home on the Rim a little more festive with Santa and Elf hats! These off-world relics made it just in time for Christmas!
This is a reupload of DB's Christmas Hats that is still in B18 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1228232782
